description: I love the fair trade teas produced by Zhena’s Gypsy Tea, especially her Coconut Chai Inspired by the perfume of coconut in that tea, I infused shredded coconut and ginger and added a little fresh lime juice, honey and a smidgeon of turmeric The idea of making a turmeric and honey paste comes from Heidi Swanson’s 101cookbooks.com.
title: Coconut Ginger Tea With Lime, Honey and Turmeric
title_page: Coconut Ginger Tea With Lime, Honey and Turmeric Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
I love the fair trade teas produced by Zhena’s Gypsy Tea, especially her Coconut Chai. Inspired by the perfume of coconut in that tea, I infused shredded coconut and ginger and added a little fresh lime juice, honey and a smidgeon of turmeric. The idea of making a turmeric and honey paste comes from Heidi Swanson’s 101cookbooks.com.
Featured in: Tonics And Teas.
